flavorText: No true angels have been created since the founding of New Capenna, but artisans have learned to craft elegant facsimiles.

foreignData.flavorText: Seit der Gründung von Neu-Capenna wurden keine echten Engel mehr erschaffen, aber Handwerker haben gelernt, elegante Repliken herzustellen.

foreignData.text:
Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: Desde la fundación de Nueva Capenna no se crean ángeles verdaderos. No obstante, los artesanos aprendieron a elaborar facsímiles elegantes.

foreignData.flavorText: ニューカペナ創成期以降に本物の天使は創造されなかったが、職人たちは優雅な複製物を製作するようになった。

foreignData.flavorText: 뉴 카펜나가 설립된 이후로는 진정한 천사가 생겨난 적이 없지만, 장인들은 우아한 복제품을 만들어내는 법을 배웠다.

name: Paragon of Modernity
originalText:
Flying
{3}: Paragon of Modernity gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If exactly three colors of mana were spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.

rulings.text: Colorless is not a color. Similarly, colorless mana isn't counted when determining the number of colors that were spent on an ability.
